TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, Platan said:
> 
> 
> Same problem in 1.4.1 since the new update (0.0326). I have to disabled the Ocean Shaders to work
> 

or just avoid using Scatterer for a week, Fixes will come, just gotta have patience, at first i thought it was a problem with SVE but Galileo pointed me here

So I tried doing mission to Laythe and I have an issue of Jool being seen through Laythe, I believe that Scatterer is responsible for this bug as it handles the visuals of the atmospheres of the planets. This also seems weird as the map view in game shows jool perfectly covered behind Laythe.

Here are the photos showing the bug and also the Scatterer settings I've put up inside the game's start menu:

[https://imgur.com/a/uMGoF](https://imgur.com/a/uMGoF)

[@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) Sorry this is gonna be a kinda sloppy report, more of a heads up.  So you obviously know that other bodies have a tendency to be "eaten by the kraken" sometimes, but im also having an issue with the body im orbiting too. Complete blackness except for the sun. I've got SVE, <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr>, and scatterer. Thought you should know. Mod works fine otherwise =)

Alright, nobody panic, here is a hotfix update: [https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/releases/tag/v0.0328dev](https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/releases/tag/v0.0328dev)

This fixes:

-Universe becoming a void

-Flipped post-processing overlay and sunflare without AA on direct3d

-Jool visible through Laythe (and other planets visible through other planets etc)

Please test, I will make a full release soon, just going to fix a few more things.

Tks [@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/)! Ill be restarting my game and giving it a test shortly =P

I've been noticing a weird thing with textures;

When within load distance of more than 1 "vessel" (flags, <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> seem to count too) Textures start zfighting alot. Im not sure if its this mod but since it started up when I installed it probably is.

Ive got SVE <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr> and the most recent offical release of scatterer.
